quotes:
Don’t fear failure. Fear being in the exact same place 
 next year as you are today
There’s is no failure you either win or you learn

When things change inside you, things change 
 around you
The body achieves what the mind believes

Everyone must choose one of 2 pains: 
pain of discipline or the pai of the muscle
All progress takes place outside the comfort zone

Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
 – Jim Rohn

The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus
.- Bruce Lee

The pain you feel today will be the strength 
 you feel tomorrow.  – Arnold Schwarzenegger

You must expect great things of yourself before 
 you can do them.- Michael Jordan

You have to think it before you can do it. 
 The mind is what makes it all possible.- Kai Greene

The best way to gain self-confidence is to 
 do what you are afraid to do.

If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
  – Fred Devito
you don’t have to be extreme you have to be consistent
